value.title: StarCraft 2: ByuN's BIZARRE Reaper Play vs Reynor!
value.excerpt: Pro match of StarCraft 2 between Reynor and ByuN. In this Terran versus Zerg ByuN decides to open up with a Reaper 'proxy' inside his own main base. While the double Rax Reaper opener is something he has shown many times, he decides to add a third Barracks and it manages to throw Reynor off guard.  Support

value.title: StarCraft 2: Cure SHUTS DOWN Reynor's Early Game!
value.excerpt: Professional match of StarCraft 2 between Reynor (Zerg) and Cure (Terran). In this match it goes poorly for Reynor in the early game, but he stabilizes and forces the macro game. For some reason Cure does not transitions to Ghosts the first chance he gets, so the game gets very close.   Support my work:
